name: Hentai Puzzle X
description:
Hentai Puzzle X is a classic sliding puzzle game with relaxing japanese traditional theme and ambience.

Features :
■ 30 Levels
■ Time Record
■ Relaxing Japanese Traditional Music
■ Beautiful Artworks
■ 4K Support
■ 100 Achievements !
■ Free Updates



We plan to update more levels, artworks & achievements as soon as posible




FOLLOW US FOR MORE UPDATES !
